story.text: (Repeats to add missing words "in December" in first paragraph)FRANKFURT Jan 3 (Reuters) - German luxury sports car maker Porsche AG's (PSHG_p.DE) sales in North America were flat at 2,947 vehicles in December, Porsche said in a statement on Wednesday. Full-year 2006 sales in North America rose 7 percent to a record 36,095 units, Porsche said.
story.title: porsche ' s u . s . vehicle sales flat in december
